dict.acceptation: （大规模）制造( manufacture的现在分词 )；捏造；加工；粗制滥造（文学作品）；

sent.orig: Lean manufacturing is a mechanical design, mechanical manufacturing, mold design, mold manufacturing-based professional team.
sent.trans: 精益制造是一以机械设计、机械制造、模具设计、模具制造为主的专业性团队。

sent.orig: Deya cruise ship manufacturing Ltd. is a professional manufacturing production inflatable boat company.
sent.trans: 德雅游艇制造有限公司是一家专业性生产充气船的公司。

sent.orig: Develops and improves manufacturing processes by studying product and manufacturing methods.
sent.trans: 研究产品特性及其制造方法，开发和改进制造工艺。

sent.orig: Chengdu Zhongde Absorber Manufacturing Corporation is an expert company in manufacturing gas springs and door butlers.
sent.trans: 成都中德气弹簧制造有限公司是一家生产气弹簧、控门器的专业公司。

sent.orig: And manufacturing capacity of production mainly depends on the advanced manufacturing equipment-machine.
sent.trans: 而制造业的生产能力主要取决与制造设备—机床的先进程度。
